Definition.WordDefinition: socialization n 1: the action of establishing on a socialist basis; "the socialization of medical services" [syn: {socialisation}] 2: the act of meeting for social purposes; "there was too much socialization with the enlisted men" [syn: {socialisation}, {socializing}, {socialising}] 3: the adoption of the behavior patterns of the surrounding culture; "the socialization of children to the norms of their culture" [syn: {socialisation}, {acculturation}, {enculturation}]
